post.summary: Request a camt.053 statement to be generated.
post.description: POSTs a statement generation request by specifying the start and end of the statement in UTC.

requestBody.description: Definition of the statement period requested.

get.summary: Retrieve a camt.053 statement which has been generated.
get.description: GETs a generated statement in camt.053 format by specifying the MessageId property of the statement and a page number.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The statement ID as per the MsgId field of the camt.053 specification; provided as the MessageId property in the Statements.ReadyForDownload webhook.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The requested page number; should be no greater than the TotalPages property of the Statements.ReadyForDownload webhook.

startDateTimeUtc.description: The statement includes transactions after this time.

endDateTimeUtc.description: The statement includes transactions before this time.

XMLObject.description: The camt.053 message in XML format.

startDateTimeUtc.description: The statement includes transactions after this time.

endDateTimeUtc.description: The statement includes transactions before this time.

StatementRequest.description: The statement generation request body defines the period for the statement to cover. The period can be no more than 25 hours.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ValidationProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807
